${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:RabbitsFoot.NAME: Rabbit's Foot
DESCRIPTIONS: % chance to double rewards from combat.

${modID}:CasinoCatalyst.NAME: Casino Catalyst
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, mark a card in hand. If you win without playing the marked card, increase your luck.
